General.Name: Luyan Pharma Co Ltd
General.Description: Luyan Pharma Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of human health products in China. It also operates pharmaceutical distribution and retail direct stores. The company was formerly known as Luyan (Fujian) Pharma Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Luyan Pharma Co.,Ltd. in June 2016. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Lei  Ming
2.Title: Deputy GM, Chief Compliance Officer & Director
